itemDescription: statesman, Viceroy of India and member of the British Conservative Party from Dublin, Ireland

wikipedia_page.main: Richard Southwell Bourke, 6th Earl of Mayo,  (21 February 1822 – 8 February 1872), styled Lord Naas between 1842 and 1867, called Lord Mayo in India, was a statesman, Viceroy of India and prominent member of the British Conservative Party from Dublin, Ireland.
